events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The case has been categorized under the refund cluster based on the customer's request and keywords.
A customer service representative was assigned to handle the refund request for this order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you would like to request a refund for your recent order.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for your refund request so I can assist you better?
The order number is 123456789, and I want a refund because the item description was misleading and I am not satisfied.
Thank you for the information. I have processed a refund for your order, and the amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for your prompt help. I appreciate the quick refund process and your assistance.
We are glad that your refund issue has been resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund was received and if everything is satisfactory with your case.
Since there were no further issues reported, we have closed your support case related to the refund request.
